com.appnexus.opensdk

Class InterstitialAdView

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • com.appnexus.opensdk.AdView
        • com.appnexus.opensdk.InterstitialAdView

  • public class InterstitialAdView
extends AdView
    This class controls loading and displaying interstitial ads.
    Author:
    Jacob Shufro

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      class  InterstitialAdView.Size
      A convenience class which holds a width and height in integers.

                  AttributeSet attrs,

        Parameters:

        attrs - The AttributeSet to use when creating the InterstitialAdView.rs
        defStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource.

    • Method Detail

      • loadAd

        public void loadAd()
        Requests a new interstitial ad from the server and stores it in a local queue. Please note, that interstitials have a timeout of 60 seconds. You must show the interstitial (call 'show()') within 60 seconds of getting a response, otherwise, the ad will not show.
        Overrides:
        loadAd in class AdView

      • show

        public int show()
        Pops ads from the queue until it finds one that has not exceeded the timeout of 60 seconds, and displays it in a new activity. All ads in the queue which have exceeded the timeout are removed.
        Returns:
        The number of remaining ads in the queue that do not exceed the timeout.

      • getAllowedSizes

        public ArrayList<InterstitialAdView.Size> getAllowedSizes()
        Returns an ArrayList of InterstitialAdView.Sizes which are allowed to be displayed.
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of InterstitialAdView.Sizes which are allowed to be displayed.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys this InterstitialAdView object.

      • getCloseButtonDelay

        public int getCloseButtonDelay()
        Returns:
        the time in milliseconds after an interstitial is displayed until the close button appears. Default is 10 seconds. 0 is disabled

      • setCloseButtonDelay

        public void setCloseButtonDelay(int closeButtonDelay)
        Parameters:
        closeButtonDelay - The time in milliseconds after an interstitial is displayed until the close button appears. Default is 10 seconds. Maximum is 15 seconds. Set to 0 to disable.

      • getInterstitialAutoDismissTime

        public int getInterstitialAutoDismissTime()
        Returns:
        the duration of display for an interstitial ad before it is automatically dismissed.

      • setInterstitialAutoDismissTime

        public void setInterstitialAutoDismissTime(int interstitialAutoDismissTime)
        Parameters:
        interstitialAutoDismissTime - The duration of display for an interstitial ad before it is automatically dismissed. Set to 0 to disable. Default is 15 seconds.
